summary: Draws the idle camera into the middle of the screen
descriptionHtml:
Hi all, I decided to do this \"mod\" for Skyrim, cause I\'ve seen so many changes in the battle camera, changing it to the side like the normal camera, while I\'ve always wanted the camera to behave like in Oblivion, so when the mod I waited for didn\'t arrive, I decided to make one myself. Hope you all like it!

Write this in the bottom of your \"Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\" Skyrim.ini file:

[Camera]
fOverShoulderAddY=0.0000
fOverShoulderPosZ=0.0000
fOverShoulderPosX=0.0000


Enjoy
author: Conny Bengtsson
